Articles.Content:
![?appid=220200](http://steamcommunity.com/id/ekudram/screenshots/?appid=220200)

Blew up on launch pad, pad damaged.... cannot access buildings.

[http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=477385543](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=477385543)

I can't tell exactly from your pictures and description if this is a bug or not, but it sounds to me like you just can't launch anything?

Right click the pad, and you should be able to fix it for a cost. If you can't afford the cost, your only option is to launch from the runway until you can afford to fix the launch pad. If you break the runway, your only option is to start a new game. Or alt-f12 to give yourself money to fix it.

If this is a true bug, I apologize ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Can't help with no logs, sorry.
